subject: Re: [R] Problem with saving R plot in Emacs
body:

> and I have to close it.
>    I am using Win XP  , R binaries,  Emacs for windows.
>    Somebody got the same problem ? Can I get some suggestions ?

This is a question for the ESS list: as you say 'Emacs freezes' so it is a 
problem in how ESS is commumicating with R.
